itunes:title: Interview With A DC Superhero (Brec Bassinger)
title: Interview With A DC Superhero (Brec Bassinger)
itunes:author: Joe Vulpis & Ilya Feddy
itunes:summary:
Our friend Brec Bassinger, star of DC's tv show 'Stargirl' and 'Bella and The Bulldogs', talks with the guys about acting, Hollywood, the Justice League, and what its like working with Luke Wilson. Brec has had an incredible acting career and is crushing it at such a young age, buckle up and enjoy fam

Follow Brec on instagram @brecbassinger

Follow us on instagram @lightweightspod
